definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: smear or plaster (over), stick, glue (NH id., besmear, plaster; Aram. [[טְפַל]] id., fig. attack; [[טְפֵילָא]] mortar; t.pel defile; As. ṭapâlu, besmear (?), Dl:Pr 48; HWB)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. [[טָֽפְלוּ]] Ps 119:69; Impf. 2 ms. [[וַתִּטְפּׂל]] Job 14:17 Pt. pl. cstr. [[טׂפְלֵי]] Job 13:4; —[[טָֽפְלוּ עָלַי שֶׁקֶר זֵדִים]] Ps 119:69 insolent men have plastered falsehood over me, ‘making his real character unrecognisable’ (De); [[טִפְלֵי שֶׁקֶר]] Job 13:4 ye are falsehood-plasterers (‖[[רׂפְאֵי אֱלִל]]); cf. As.amât tašḳirti tâpilti Ullusum, a speech of falsehood besmearing Ullusum, Dt:Pr 48; [[וַתִּטְפּׂל עֵל־עֲוֹנִי]] Job 14:17 and thou hast glued over mine iniquity, i.e. glued it up, for safe keeping against the day of reckoning (‖[[חָתֻם בִּחְרוֹר פִּשְׁעִי]]).
